Communications 2015 to Present Product Owner for a Software as a Service management portal to some of the worlds largest ecommerce companies such as ATT Bank of America and Comcast The portal configures the omnichannel customer engagement solution powered by AI and includes a rich business rule engine The portal enables complex reporting on various aspects of the engagements by interfacing with Hadoop and Solr Tech stack is Angular and Java REST API with microservices Lead the team in all areas including Scrum standup planning retrospective architecture code review maintenance performance security PCI pen test scans risk analysis documentation operations project management and product management of features Manage 7 direct report developers that includes offshore members while overseeing 6 quality assurance and 2 test automation members Responsible for hiring both onsite and offshore members Deliver features consistently on time by identifying critical path decisions Software Developer TouchCommerce 2012 to 2015 Led development effort to overhaul antiquated developercentric portal application to a new usercentric UI using clean design and flexible UI library Enforced consistent UI and UX by working closely with UI designer using GWT Increased UI test coverage by 50 by establishing and enforcing development patterns like MVP JSR 303 Editor which also standardized and simplified development effort Architected main extensible components to enforce consistent layout and UX Designed and developed the most complex and most used missioncritical features
